#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<assert.h>
#define scan(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define print(a) printf("%d\n",a)
using namespace std;
inline int getn()
{
register int n=0,
    c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main()
{
    int n,t,i,arr[14],f,j,a,b,c,d;
    t=getn();
    while(t--)
    {
        f=0;
        n=getn();a=getn();b=getn();c=getn();d=getn();
        arr[0]=a;
        arr[1]=b;
        arr[2]=c;
        arr[3]=d;
        arr[4]=a+b;
        arr[5]=a+c;
        arr[6]=a+d;
        arr[7]=a+b+c;
        arr[8]=a+b+d;
        arr[9]=a+b+c+d;
        arr[10]=b+c;
        arr[11]=b+d;
        arr[12]=c+d;
        arr[13]=b+c+d;
        
        for(i=0;i<14;i++)
        {
            if(n==arr[i])
            {
                f=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(f==1)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
